entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets changing to a few rain showers or ice pellets this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or ice pellets changing to ice pellets or freezing rain this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
